content_zh-Hans: 编码项目：个人辅导匹配平台
一个帮助学生选择心仪的个人辅导老师的平台。5人团队作品。

同学A和同学B：前端。
同学C、同学D和我：后端。
<small>我在后端常规编码之外的贡献</small>
<small>User Story（上文所述的初版）</small>
<small>给继任开发者的文档</small>

特色：
  • 使用MERN框架开发
  • 用户群体是在校学生
  • 每个用户都可以申请成为个人辅导老师，但需要通过管理员的审核
  • 学生和个人辅导老师的配对，也需要经过管理员的许可
  • 根据个人辅导老师的日程表，学生可以预约在特定时间和地点的个人辅导
  • 系统会追踪个人辅导的落实情况，学校根据追踪结果给个人辅导老师发工资

测试用账号 (所有账号的密码都是“1”):
  • 学生: Lynsey6887@bot.com; Beth2756@bot.com; Winonah274@bot.com; Liza5648@bot.com;
  • 个人辅导老师: Eolande4582@bot.com; Elaine8298@bot.com; Saundra8111@bot.com; Annemarie9254@bot.com;
  • 管理员: Gipsy4404@bot.com;
href="http://ec2-52-65-161-190.ap-southeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com:3001/"
在线网站（部署在AWS）
源代码（GitHub）
content_en: Coding Project: Tutor Matching Platform
A platform where students choose their desired tutors. Work of a team of five.

Colleague A and B: frontend.
Colleague C, D and me: backend.
<small>My Contributions besides the Regular Coding Tasks of Backend</small>
<small>User Story (First Version as Mentioned Above)</small>
<small>Document for Future Developers</small>

Features:
  • Developped with MERN framework
  • User group is the students of a university
  • Every user can apply to become a tutor, which is then audited by the admin
  • Tutoring pairs also need to be approved by the admin
  • Upon the tutor's schedule, the student sets onsite tutoring appointments at specific time and place
  • System keeps tracking the results of onsite tutoring appointments, based on which the university would pay the tutors

Accounts for testing (the password is "1" for all accounts):
  • students: Lynsey6887@bot.com; Beth2756@bot.com; Winonah274@bot.com; Liza5648@bot.com;
  • tutor: Eolande4582@bot.com; Elaine8298@bot.com; Saundra8111@bot.com; Annemarie9254@bot.com;
  • admin: Gipsy4404@bot.com;
href="http://ec2-52-65-161-190.ap-southeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com:3001/"
Live (Hosted via AWS)
Code Repository (GitHub)

content_zh-Hans: 编码项目：文章分析
一个收集并分析来自维基百科API的数据的网站，修改自课程COMP5347 Web Application Development的团队作业。

同学A：后端的/app/models（数据库操作）。
我：前端，后端的/app/controllers（用户请求和服务器行为的映射）。
作业得分（现场演示和Q&A）：20/20。

特色：
  • 使用MEAN框架开发
  • 数据库全局分析、单个文章分析和单个作者分析
  • 使用Google Charts进行了数据可视化
  • 结课后，自己添加的功能：用户输入文章标题，增加新的文章到数据库
  • 结课后，自己添加的功能：鼠标悬停时的文章预览
href="http://ec2-52-65-161-190.ap-southeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com:3000/"
在线网站（部署在AWS）
源代码（GitHub）
content_en: Coding Project: Article Insight
A simple website that collects and analyzes data from WikiPedia API, altered from a group assignment of course COMP5347 Web Application Developments.

Colleague A: /app/models (database operations) of backend.
Me: frontend, and /app/controllers (mapping user requests to business logic in server) of backend.
Assignment mark (onsite demo and Q&A): 20 out of 20.

Features:
  • Developped with MEAN framework
  • Overall analytics, individual article analytics and author analytics
  • Data visualization with Google Charts
  • Additional feature added by me after the course: adding new entries to the database according to the article title specified by the user
  • Additional feature added by me after the course: article preview on coursor hover
href="http://ec2-52-65-161-190.ap-southeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com:3000/"
Live (Hosted via AWS)
Code Repository (GitHub)

content_zh-Hans: Course Taken: COMP5347 Web Application Development

Lecturer: Basem Suleiman
Place: University of Sydney
Course duration: 13 weeks
Mark: High Distinction (85/100)

Upon completion of the course, the student will be able to:
  • describe and analyse web application architectures and report on the understanding
  • obtain development skills with regard to a core set of technologies
  • undertake collaborative web application development in a small team environment
  • understand important non-functional requirements of web application such as performance and security
Assignment One: Book List Viewer - Live Delopyment
Assignment One: Book List Viewer - Source Code

content_zh-Hans: Course Taken: ELEC5619 Object Oriented Application Frameworks

Lecturer: David Boland
Place: University of Sydney
Course duration: 13 weeks

Upon completion of the course, the student will be able to:
  • understand how to build large scale reusable systems using Java frameworks
  • Implement an application using Spring Framework and Hibernate Object relational Mapping
  • Proficiently develop web applications using Eclipse, Maven and Version Control Systems
  • compare web application frameworks
Assignment Source Code (Group work; I was responsible for the forum part front to end)

content_zh-Hans: Course Taken: COMP9103 Software Development in Java

Lecturer: Ali Anaissi
Place: University of Sydney
Course duration: 13 weeks
Mark: High Distinction (93/100)

Upon completion of the course, the student will be able to:
  • understand, modify, and add functionality to Java programs
  • trace, test and debug in basic Java programs
  • understand the essential concepts of object-oriented programming, including classes, objects, encapsulation, inheritance, interface, and polymorphism
  • design Java solutions that address the problems identified
Assignment Source Code: Electronic Contact Book

content_zh-Hans: 编码项目：Window内核驱动加载器
一个驱动加载工具，在Windows内核的学习过程中可以提供帮助。

<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="//player.bilibili.com/player.html?aid=201233925&bvid=BV1jz411v74g&cid=208348171&page=1&high_quality=1&danmaku=0" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

说明：
  • 让用户代码在0环权限下运行的途径（比如在代码里给空指针指向的内存赋值，会直接造成系统蓝屏重启，而非仅仅是单体程序的崩溃）
  • 成功加载后的用户代码，是内核程序ntoskrnl.exe的一个模块
使用说明
href="https://wws.lanzous.com/io5z4e9hk4j"
可执行文件下载（蓝奏云）
源代码（GitHub）
content_en: Coding Project: Windows Kernel Driver Loader
A driver loader tool that helps in the study of Windows kernel.
<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/434961824" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Notes:
  • A way to grant Ring 0 privilege for user's code (i.e. assigning value to a NULL pointer's pointing address would cause the blue screen error, instead of a specific application's crash)
  • The successfully loaded user's code acts as a module binded with the kernel program ntoskrnl.exe
Use Introduction (Chinese)
href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1VDc8WPfizfodK9w2Ms7CNlHzCLLhC5qi?usp=sharing"
Executable Download (Google Drive)
Code Repository (GitHub)

content_zh-Hans: 编码项目：植物大战僵尸游戏辅助工具

仅供学习使用！
一个能无限制种植豌豆射手的辅助工具。

<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="//player.bilibili.com/player.html?aid=883659272&bvid=BV1DK4y147Po&cid=208101927&page=1&high_quality=1&danmaku=0" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

步骤：
  • 使用CheatEngine，定位阳光的内存地址
  • 由于种植植物会减少阳光，使用OllyDbg，拦截到种植植物函数
  • 在游戏进程中申请一块堆空间，并把辅助工具dll的路径写入此空间
  • 在游戏进程中创建远程线程，此线程会加载辅助工具dll
  • 辅助工具dll会监听DEL键的按下事件，触发此事件会让辅助工具的窗口跳出
  • 当用户在辅助工具的窗口点击鼠标，线程会调用之前拦截到的种植植物函数的地址，并使用特定的函数参数（自定植物的类型和坐标）
href="https://wws.lanzous.com/itzeee8tnnc"
可执行文件下载（蓝奏云）
源代码（GitHub）
content_en: Coding Project: Game Assistance Plants vs Zombies

For study purpose only!
A tool to plant Peashooter anywhere without cold-down.
<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/434653404" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Steps:
  • Using CheatEngine, located the memory address of Sun
  • Using OllyDbg, intercepted the memory address of the planting function, since it causes the decrease of Sun
  • Allocated heap memory in PvZ process, and wrote the assistance dll's path into the heap
  • Created remote thread in PvZ process, which would load the assistance dll
  • The assistance dll would listen to KEYDOWN event of DEL, which would trigger the assistance window's appearance
  • When user clicked in the assistance window, called the previously intercepted planting function's address, with arbitrary parameters (plant type and position)
href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1kosHNwibYfFa_6pvcXbufKA8rBibAdtK?usp=sharing"
Executable Download (Google Drive)
Code Repository (GitHub)

content_zh-Hans: 编码项目：Das Boot
PC远程控制（Windows平台）。

<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="//player.bilibili.com/player.html?aid=13622822&bvid=BV1Fx411n7qB&cid=22293908&page=1&high_quality=1&danmaku=0" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

特色：
  • 插件形式的设计：功能以dll文件的形式单独传输给客户端
  • 客户端的功能只是接收和加载dll文件，因此它不需要频繁的修改或更新
  • 功能传输到客户端后会动态加载，无需重启客户端
href="https://wws.lanzous.com/irMDNebxgih"
可执行文件下载（蓝奏云）
源代码（GitHub）
content_en: Coding Project: Das Boot

Remote PC control (Windows Platform).

Video timeline: 0:00 Starting server and client; 0:15 Process management; 0:54 File management (unfinished yet); 1:47 Screen monitoring; 2:24 Command prompt.
<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/435450607" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Features:
  • Addons design: functionalities are sent to clients individually as dll files
  • The client program's functionalities are solely receiving and loading dll files, thus it doesn't need frequent modifications or updates
  • Functionalities are dynamically loaded once received, needless to restart the client program
href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1JL-hbgS6L5CzV_zuuJ6QasJTxp5VAdo7?usp=sharing"
Executable Download (Google Drive)
Code Repository (GitHub)

在固定大小的字节数组中，对信息（例如学生信息）实现了增、删、改、查操作。

<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="//player.bilibili.com/player.html?aid=711129298&bvid=BV1jD4y1Q733&cid=208473369&page=1&high_quality=1&danmaku=0" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

特色：
  • 数组可以在空间不足时自动扩容
  • 单字母命令风格的控制台交互界面，有基本的输入检查
  • 支持正则表达式
  • 数据实时保存在硬盘文件中
  • 在数组内部，简单地模拟了一些管理操作，比如空间分配、空间扩容和碎片清理

content_en: Coding Project: Simple CRUD with C

Within a fixed-size char-array, carry out Create, Read, Update and Delete operations upon entries like student information.

(The video below is text-intensive and in Chinese.)
<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/435030770" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Features:
  • The char-array can automatically get enlarged when space is insufficient
  • One-letter style command prompt interface, with basic input validation
  • Regular expression support
  • Data is persistently stored in disk files
  • Within the array, roughly simulated managerial operations like allocating space, extending space and defragmentation
  • Full functionality introduction is displayed with '-h' command in program
href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Sb2Y1ipML-kFS5f1aiZxy29MEQIYZlSB?usp=sharing"

content_zh-Hans: Coding Project: LogClusterC
C-based implementation of the LogCluster algorithm, a density-based data clustering algorithm for event logs, introduced by Risto Vaarandi and Mauno Pihelgas in 2015.
<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/433554834" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Features:
  • Performance oriented: 30GB log files' patterns can be discovered within 30 minutes
  • String hash table and prefix tree, optimized for both performance and memory consumption
  • 24 supported command-line options: basic analytics and advanced heuristics
  • Abnormality (outlier events) detection
  • Regular expression support
  • Three levels of verbosity for console output
href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1X0Kv1O9mHvxNCU2XaVkYsafQ_KPFg2kF?usp=sharing"
Executable Download (Google Drive)
Code Repository (GitHub)
Project Related Content: Conference Paper (short)
Project Related Content: Thesis (long)

content_zh-Hans: Course Taken: ITX8070 Information Systems Attacks and Defense

Lecturer: Kaur Kasak
Place: Tallinn University of Technology
Course duration: 12 weeks (104 hours of study)
Mark: 4 (Lab Results + Written Exam)

On completion of the course the student has:
  • knowledge about common attack methods and vulnerabilities of information systems
  • knowledge about technological defense methods against cyber attacks
  • practical experience in conducting penetration tests of (lab) systems
Lab Notes: Scanning, MITM, Credential Attaks, Code Injection, SQLI, XSS, etc.
Bonus Lab Notes: Stack Overflow

content_zh-Hans: Course Taken: ITX8071 Cyber Defense Monitoring Solutions

Lecturer: Risto Vaarandi
Place: Tallinn University of Technology
Course duration: 16 weeks (156 hours of study)
Mark: 5 (100/100)

On completion of the course the student:
  • has an overview of the principles and standards of log collecting (BSD and IETF syslog)
  • can tune the UNIX logging software syslogd, rsyslog ja syslog-ng
  • is able to filter the network packets and generate log messages using netfilter firewall
  • knows different dialects of the regular expression languages (ERE, Perl) and is able to use these in the log monitoring
  • has an overview of the event correlation principles
  • is able to correlate events using Simple Event Correlator and use it for discovering and responding to attacks using different correlation techniques
  • has an overview of the network-based intrusion detection and prevention systems (network IDS/IPS)
  • is able to use Snort for intrusion detection and prevention
Assignment: event correlation rules used in Simple Event Correlator.
Assignment: event correlation rules used in Simple Event Correlator.
Test: firewall configuration, regular expression and event correlation rules.
Assignments and Tests

content_zh-Hans: Coding Project: Simple Process Manager
A simple process manager for Windows.

Features:
  • Process: terminate, increase/decrease priority
  • Thread: terminate, suspend, resume
  • Virtual memory: base address, size, access protection
  • Modules: name, path, base address, unload
  • CPU information and usage curve
  • Physical memory information and usage curve
  • Windows enumeration

Executable Download (Google Drive)
Code Repository (GitHub)

content_zh-Hans: 编码项目: x86反汇编引擎

在学习x86汇编的过程中编写。把操作码复制到input.txt文件，反汇编引擎会把结果输出到命令行窗口和output.txt文件。.
Reference: Intel 64 and IA-32 Architectures Software Developer's Manual的附录A OPCODE MAP

<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="//player.bilibili.com/player.html?aid=926481844&bvid=BV1MT4y1j7hX&cid=215410266&page=1&high_quality=1&danmaku=0&mute=1" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

功能：
  • 单字节操作码：100%覆盖
  • 双字节操作码：90%覆盖（最常见的那些） 0F00; 0F80-0F8F; 0F90-0F9F; 0FB6, 0FB7; 0FBE, 0FBF; 0FAF
  • 三字节操作码：没有写
href="https://wws.lanzous.com/i35rkevi6nc"
可执行文件下载（蓝奏云）
源代码（GitHub）
content_en: Coding Project: x86 Disassembler

A project done during the process of learning x86 Assembly. Copy the opcode into the input.txt file, and the disassembler will output the result to the console and the output.txt file.
Reference: Appendix A OPCODE MAP in Intel 64 and IA-32 Architectures Software Developer's Manual
<iframe class="embeddedvideo" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/432441815?&muted=1" width="640" height="360" frameborder="1" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Features:
  • One-byte Opcode coverage: 100%
  • Two-byte Opcode coverage: 90% (the popular ones), including 0F00; 0F80-0F8F; 0F90-0F9F; 0FB6, 0FB7; 0FBE, 0FBF; 0FAF;
  • Three-byte Opcode coverage: None
href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/185WiQ4llzK_Ar2VrQnO8W0d6DcfrJLf3?usp=sharing"
Executable Download (Google Drive)
Code Repository (GitHub)

Lecturer: Truls Tuxen Ringkjob, Erkki Kukk
Place: Tallinn University of Technology, University of Tartu
Course duration: 32 weeks (312 hours of study)

On completing the course a student:
  • can install, operate and troubleshoot medium sized routed and switched networks
  • can implement and troubleshoot various protocols to manage addressing
  • is able to perform load balancing and authentication
  • is able to establish and troubleshoot connection to service provider over WAN
  • is prepared for CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) certification exam

content_zh-Hans: 学过的课程: IDK1011 Introduction to Programming

Lecturer: Msury Rogasian Mahunnah
Place: Tallinn University of Technology
Course duration: 16 weeks (104 hours of study)

After completing the course, student should:
  • be familiar with algorithms creation
  • be able to create Scratch applications
  • be able to create simple programs using Python or VBA programming language
Assignment 1 requirements.

Assignment 1 deliverable screenshot. See the source code & Play this game online!

This work was inspired by the popular car parking games in the Scratch community. Though the Scratch environment is not for serious developing, this work encountered and solved two challenging problems:
1. Dynamic playground rendering. Most of the programs in the Scratch community are in a static canvas playground, while this program figured out a way to render a much bigger and dynamic playground for the racing cars. (Trick: User's blue car is always in the screen center, changing directions but never actually moving. In fact, the playground moves as opposed to the user input direction.)
2. Computer player simulation. The cars in red and yellow are simulated computer players, who participate the racing game by querying the stored route data and using random number generater.
Assignment 2 requirements.
Assignment 2 deliverable screenshot.
Assignment 2 deliverable code snippet: guessing the number. Full source code
Assignment 3 deliverable code snippet: filling user input to dynamic array. Full source code
Assignment 4 requirements.
Assignment 4 code snippet: (part of) the timer tick handler. Full source code
Assignments: Requirements, Screenshots, Code Snippets and Source Code
Results table
Final Mark: 5 (98/100)
content_en: Course Taken: IDK1011 Introduction to Programming

Lecturer: Msury Rogasian Mahunnah
Place: Tallinn University of Technology
Course duration: 16 weeks (104 hours of study)

After completing the course, student should:
  • be familiar with algorithms creation
  • be able to create Scratch applications
  • be able to create simple programs using Python or VBA programming language
Assignment 1 requirements.

Assignment 1 deliverable screenshot. See the source code & Play this game online!

This work was inspired by the popular car parking games in the Scratch community. Though the Scratch environment is not for serious developing, this work encountered and solved two challenging problems:
1. Dynamic playground rendering. Most of the programs in the Scratch community are in a static canvas playground, while this program figured out a way to render a much bigger and dynamic playground for the racing cars. (Trick: User's blue car is always in the screen center, changing directions but never actually moving. In fact, the playground moves as opposed to the user input direction.)
2. Computer player simulation. The cars in red and yellow are simulated computer players, who participate the racing game by querying the stored route data and using random number generater.
